Home.title: Hello everyone! I'M <bold>TRAN BAO TRUNG</bold>
Home.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail
Home.author: Benjamin Franklin

about.heading: about
about.part1: I am currently a second year student majoring in MIS International School - Hanoi National University. I have a passion for Website development, I focus on the backend of a website - operations related to processing, logic, working with databases...
about.part2: I am a person who is always eager to learn and absorb new things to develop myself. Besides, I am also looking for real work or projects to gain more experience and improve my problem solving ability.

contact.heading: contact
contact.desc: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me

desc.part1: Hello everyone, I am Tran Bao Trung from Hanoi, Vietnam
desc.part2: I am currently a second year student majoring in MIS International School - Hanoi National University. I have a passion for Website development, I focus on the backend of a website - operations related to processing, logic, working with databases...
desc.part3: I am a person who is always eager to learn and absorb new things to develop myself. Besides, I am also looking for real work or projects to gain more experience and improve my problem solving ability.

fun-facts.heading: fun-facts
fun-facts.fact1: I like winter more than summer
fun-facts.fact3: I often bike around the city
fun-facts.fact4: I spend most of my free time on self-development
fun-facts.fact5: I am keen on learning foreign languages
fun-facts.fact6: I like to collect things with strange shapes
